name: BADABING-hotrestaurant
description: * Front-End     1. what UI elements are there?     index.html: reservation btn, view tables btn         footer: API Table Link/API Waitlist link     reservation.html: form with submit btn, home btn, view table btn         footer: API Table Link/API Waitlist link     table.html: cards with booked table info, reservation btn, home btn         footer: clear table/API Table Link/API Waitlist link     *each html with footer control panel*     2. what information does the user need?     link to website     Name, Phone#, EMail, ID     3. can we leverage any bootstrap components in our design     jumbotron, btn, form, card, icon
